title: Paul Anleitner - The Shape of Reality: What is our Role in the Story? What's Love Got to Do With It?
description:
Paul Anleitner of the Deep Talks podcast joins me today for a conversation.

Paul grew up during the era of charismatic renewal and experienced revival firsthand, and then went on to desire more of God, searching through history, philosophy and theology.

His Deep Talks podcast seeks openness to the tough questions and finding a way for all of us to share our maps so that we can better together see the shape of Reality.

Paul's recent conversation with Paul VanderKlay and John Vervaeke:
https://youtu.be/UGq34dLXrFI

A message from Paul Anleitner about the Cosmic Christ which is also a link to his channel.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=djASEK4qVu0

The Morality of Fundamental Physics, a lecture by Nima Arkani-Hamed:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5aAMJNVmdoY

Visual Summary of Wolfram's Theory of Everything: https://www.wolframphysics.org/visual-summary/dark/

The Meaning Code in conversation with Matt Allison about the theory:
https://youtu.be/i884sCymhb8

A conversation between Wolfram and Gregory Chaitin that explores the theory and then begins to explore theological ideas.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Mtt6PWt0Kcg&list=PLoARw9zo4EUZtF8ldv2sK2AEWlRfwalgS&index=6
